'''Great View From Up Here''' may refer to:

* {{slink|Advancement|Great View From Up Here}}, an advancement by moving 50 blocks vertically while having the [[Levitation]] effect that and rewards {{xp|50}}.
* {{slink|Achievement|Great View From Up Here}}, an achievement by moving 50 blocks vertically while having the [[Levitation]] effect.
* {{slink|Achievement/Legacy Console and New Nintendo 3DS editions|Great View From Up Here}}, a ''Legacy Console Edition''/''New Nintendo 3DS Edition'' achievement by having the Levitation effect applied, and move a vertical distance of 50 blocks.
